events.message: I received the blender I ordered yesterday, but it is not working properly. The motor seems faulty and it doesn’t blend at all.
The issue has been identified as a product defect based on the customer’s description of a faulty motor.
Assigning this case to technical support team member John for further assistance regarding the defective blender.
Hello, I’m John from technical support. I understand your blender isn’t working properly. Let’s see how we can resolve this.
Could you please confirm if there were any unusual noises or smells when you first tried to use the blender? Also, do you have the original packaging?
There was a weird burning smell when I switched it on the first time, and the motor stopped immediately. I still have the box and all packing materials.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a replacement blender right away and arrange for the defective unit to be collected from your address.
That sounds great, thank you. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the replacement as soon as possible.
The replacement order has been processed and the pickup for the defective blender is scheduled. Your issue is now resolved.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement blender and that it is functioning correctly now.
